name: Ruri Ruri – Artwork Generator
description:
Ruri Ruri is an single click artwork generator, that will allow you to:

  • generate unlimited editable artworks within seconds
  • use predefined shapes or use your own
  • randomise every aspect of shape - size, ratio, position, color, blend mode and more
  • discover new creative directions
  • scale your brand visual library


Upcoming features:

  • new layouts
  • add more colors
